Text: Multiply the maximum number of beavers a house can have by this value, rounded down, but with a minimum of 1. Game default: 1.
Multiply the sleep need satisfaction by this value. Game default: 1, so at +0.2 per hour (Beaver can have -0.2 to 0.8 sleep, -0.6 per day).
Multiply the Shelter need satisfaction by this value. Game default: 1 so at +0.3 per hour (Beaver can have -0.2 to 0.8 Shelter, -0.3 per day)
Movez toutes les entrées au premier étage (comme les Double Lodges). Travaillez également pour les maisons ajoutées par des mods. Aucun changement graphique. Par défaut du jeu : non
Folktails can build the houses of Iron Teeth and vice versa. Do not work for houses added by mods. Game default: no
Add Procreation to all Housings, so Folktails can procreate in Iron Teeth's Housings.
Remove procreation from all housings, so Iron Teeth cannot procreate in Folktails' housings.
